Holy Water.effect: You may discard this card to gain +5 WILL and STRENGTH during a Combat Encounter.
Holy Water.action: You may discard this card to choose an investigator on your space. That investigator gains a Blessed Condition.

Puzzle Box.effect: When you perform a Rest action, you may attempt to open the puzzle box (OBSERVATION -2) If you pass, you may discard this card to gain 1 Artifact.

Arcane Scholar.effect: Gain +1 LORE. You may reroll 1 die when resolving a LORE test.

Fishing Net.effect: You may reroll 1 die when resolving a STRENGTH test during a Combat Encounter. Reduce the damage of Monsters you encounter by 1 to a minimum of 1.

Double-barreled Shotgun.effect: Gain +4 during Combat Encounters. Each 6 you roll when resolving a STRENGTH test during a Combat Encounter counts as 2 successes.

.18 Derringer.effect: You may add 1 to the result of 1 die when resolving a STRENGTH test during Combat Encounters.

Carbine Rifle.effect: Once per round, you may gain +5 STRENGTH during a Combat Encounter

Dynamite.action: You may discard this card to cause each Monster on your space to lose 3 Health.

Bandages.effect: You may discard this card to prevent an investigator on your space from losing up to 2 Health.

Kerosene.effect: You may discard this card to gain +5 STRENGTH during a Combat Encounter

Lucky Cigarette Case.effect: Once per round, you may add 1 to the result of 1 die when resolving a test.

Fine Clothes.effect: Each 6 you roll when performing an Acquire Assets action counts as 2 successes.

Cat Burglar.action: Roll 1 die. On a 5 or 6, gain 1 Item or Trinket Asset from the reserve. On a 1, discard this card.

Arcane Manuscripts.effect: Gain +1 LORE when resolving Spell effects.

Arcane Tome.effect: Gain +2 LORE when resolving Spell effects. When you perform a Rest action, you may test LORE. If you pass, gain 1 Spell.

King James Bible.effect: You may reroll 1 die when resolving a WILL test during a Combat Encounter. When you perform a Rest action, recover 1 additional Sanity.

Private Investigator.effect: Gain +1 OBSERVATION. You may reroll 1 die when resolving a OBSERVATION test.

Spirit Dagger.effect: Gain +1 WILL and +2 STRENGTH during Combat Encounters

Pocket Watch.effect: You cannot become Delayed unless you choose to.

Bull Whip.effect: Gain +1 STRENGTH during Combat Encounters. You may reroll 1 die when resolving a STRENGTH test during a Combat Encounter.

Whiskey.effect: You may discard this card to prevent an investigator on your space from losing up to 2 sanity.

Axe.effect: Gain +2 STRENGTH during Combat Encounters. You may spend 2 Sanity to reroll any number of dice when resolving a STRENGTH test during a Combat Encounter.

Lucky Rabbit's Foot.effect: Once per round, you may reroll 1 die when resolving a test.

Hired Muscle.effect: Gain +1 STRENGTH. You may reroll 1 die when resolving a STRENGTH test.

Lodge Researcher.effect: If you defeat a Monster during a Combat Encounter, recover 1 Sanity and gain 1 Clue.

Vatican Missionary.effect: Gain +1 WILL. You may reroll 1 die when resolving a WILL test.

Urban Guide.effect: If you are on a City space, investigators on your space roll 1 additional die when resolving tests except when resolving Other World Encounters.

Witch Doctor.effect: Investigators on your space may recover 1 additional Health or discard a Cursed Condition when performing a Rest action.
